cz.cuni.mff.kocur.world

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.world.Inventory

  • public class Inventory
extends Object
    Class that represents hero's inventory. Inventory is split in 3 parts. INVENTORY, BACKPACK, STASH. This class supplies functions to manage all of the inventory types and to look at the inventory as one object.
    Author:
    kocur

      • addToSlot

        public void addToSlot(int slot,
                      Item item)
        Adds item to inventory on given slot.
        Parameters:
        slot - Index of slot where you want to add the item.
        item - Item that should be added to that slot.

      • getItem

        public Item getItem(int slot)
        Parameters:
        slot - Index of inventory slot that you want to retrieve.
        Returns:
        Returns item stored in passed slot or "" if no item is stored there.

        Returns:

      • findInInventory

        public int findInInventory(String name)
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the item.
        Returns:
        Returns index of item with given name in inventory(inv, backpack, stash). Returns -1 if it wasn't found.

      • countItems

        public int countItems(Item nextItem)
        Counts items with same name as passed item inside the whole inventory (stash, backpack ..).
        Parameters:
        nextItem - Item we are counting.
        Returns:
        Returns the count of items.

      • countInComponents

        private int countInComponents(Item nextItem,
                              Item item)
        Recursively counts all the components with the given name.
        Parameters:
        nextItem - Item we are looking for.
        item - Out current item, where we start looking.
        Returns:
